title: Book Trump tried to block flies off shelves
text:
Book Trump tried to block flies off shelves 2:16pm EST - 02:06 
The publisher of a scathing tell-all about the first year of the Trump Administration rushed the book to stores Friday, citing ''unprecedented demand,'' and after the president's lawyers threatened legal action.   
The publisher of a scathing tell-all about the first year of the Trump Administration rushed the book to stores Friday, citing "unprecedented demand," and after the president's lawyers threatened legal action.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/01/05/book-trump-tried-to-block-flies-off-shel?videoId=378354093&videoChannel=1
